short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to scan any piece of clothing online to check its environmental impact.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yogiline is a website that allows you to scan the composition of any item online to check if it has a good or bad environmental impact. This extension allows you to launch the scan directly from the shop that you're browsing to save time.
